message: Let's split it 50/50, fair and simple!
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I think I deserve more for my negotiating skills
That's a bit too one-sided! I think I deserve a better deal for my negotiating skills too!
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of again!
I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm taking the majority
No way, that's way too little for me! I'm not going to settle for a tiny consolation prize!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to give up my share without a fight!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm still the one driving the negotiation
That's still not good enough! I deserve more than a quarter of the money!
I'm not afraid to take control of the negotiation - let's see if you're willing to meet me at this price!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still not willing to give up my majority stake
I'm not going to settle for 35% - I want a fair share of the money!
I'm not going to give you the majority stake - it's time for me to take control!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to let you take control
That's still not good enough - I want a more equal split!
I'm making my final offer - take it or leave it!
I'll give you a 50/50 split, but only because I don't want to leave everything on the table
Finally! I'm glad we could come to a fair agreement. 50/50 it is!
